name: PATTERNIST
description:
At first we thought it was the weather that caused unfamiliar particles to appear in the atmosphere. But after the documents leaked we started to see patterns. Strange landscapes materialized as new systems emerged.

You will detect uncharted elements among the familiar ones, and reveal alien landscapes that can veil and eventually envelope the conventional. Unusual maps, crafty trades and encoded perspectives lay and wait for you as you engage with urban environments through the lens of a newly identified exoplanet called Patternist-3. You may even stumble upon the source of a mysterious phenomenon in the process.  Patternist is a world beckoning you to play.
